post.body: I wish I was your neighbor.
UCLA is great! My sister and my other brother both went there. I think you'd like it. Good food! ;)
covering oozing lip rings is a must, too. too gross for words.
ok, let me know when the party get started.
it's never too early for that.
I think I have some kind of disease that makes me eat cookies non-stop and never feel full.
I couldn't even get in trader joe's because there was no parking. will try again tonight. Joe pick locations with the worst parking EVER.
Making predictions and going to trader joe's in the rain.
Karen is our holiday madness mascot this year: http://visualchronicles.typepad.com/
I wonder if Santa will bring the neighbor kids new balls. Since it's been raining, my yard has been a ball-free zone.
I just hit "reply all" on a response to an email someone sent me. It had to be done. It was an urban legend scam. Karen will be proud.
Watching the Reba & Kelly Clarkson Crossroads for the hundredth time. I love this one. Up next: Def Leppard & Taylor Swift.
Thinking I'll burn all my stuff and just move to a fancy bus in the Wilderness. But I'll take Zone bars, a map, and a cell phone.
Thinking that if the neighbors leave their house in the middle of the night, Phil and Mitzy should just move right in!
My neighbors have been packing all their stuff into a Budget moving van in the middle of the night. Hmmm.
Day two of cooking for my people starts now.
Wondering if it is too late to call a party in a time zone 3 hours later.
Discussing who discovered America and who put it on the map.
And we are on the road and traffic is bad.
Cooking for my people.
